sunscreen.product name: Dry Touch Facial Sunscreen - Broad Spectrum SPF 50+
sunscreen.description: A lightweight, dry-touch Broad Spectrum SPF 50+ sunscreen for face that works to filter out UVA/UVB rays, while moisturizing and soothing skin.
sunscreen.benefits: Broad Spectrum SPF 50+ UVA/UVB sun care/protection. Soothes, softens, hydrates. Antioxidant-rich formula, fights free radicals. Supports skin firmness + elasticity. Dry-touch cream. Lightweight, velvety finish. No white cast or sticky residue.
sunscreen.usage: Apply to face 15 minutes before sun exposure or swimming. Gently smooth onto skin. Re-apply every 2 hours, and after swimming or sports activities. Avoid eyes. Can be used on its own or layered under makeup.

sunscreen.product name: Sunscreen Body Lotion Spray - Broad Spectrum SPF 50+ Sunblock for Body
sunscreen.description: A lightweight, Broad Spectrum SPF 50+ sunscreen lotion spray for body that works to filter out UVA/UVB rays, while moisturizing and soothing skin.
sunscreen.benefits: Broad Spectrum SPF 50+ UVA/UVB sun care/protection. Hydrates + comforts. Fights free radicals. Supports skin firmness + elasticity. Spray-on lotion. No white cast or sticky residue.
sunscreen.usage: Apply to body 15 minutes before sun exposure. Re-apply immediately after swimming or sports. Avoid eye area. Children under 6 months, consult a doctor.

sunscreen.product name: UV Plus SPF 50 Anti Pollution Face Sunscreen
sunscreen.description: Daily, oil-free multi-protection UV sunscreen with broad spectrum SPF 50.
sunscreen.benefits: Helps protect and lock out sunburn damaging UVA/UVB rays. Fights free radicals. Clarins’ plant-based Anti-Pollution Complex helps protect skin from indoor and outdoor pollutants.
sunscreen.usage: Apply to face and neck after moisturizing.

sunscreen.product name: UV PLUS Anti-Pollution Tinted Sunscreen SPF 50
sunscreen.description: Oil-free, daily multi-protection tinted sunscreen with broad spectrum SPF 50.
sunscreen.benefits: Helps protect skin from photo-aging and dark spots. Fights free radicals. Clarins’ plant-based Anti-Pollution Complex helps protect skin from indoor and outdoor pollutants.
sunscreen.usage: Apply to face and neck, morning and evening.

sunscreen.product name: Soothing After Sun Balm With Antioxidants
sunscreen.description: Soothing after sun balm for face and body hydrates skin for 48 hours* and promotes a long-lasting, intense tan.
sunscreen.benefits: Hydrates skin for 48 hours* Promotes a long-lasting, intense tan that resists peeling and flaking. Leaves skin soft, smooth and comfortable. Non-sticky balm texture melts into the skin without leaving white residue. Tropical, woody-floral scent with a twist of citrus. Sleek take-along tube, great for travel!
sunscreen.usage: Smooth onto face and body skin immediately after sun exposure.

sunscreen.product name: After Sun Face Gel - Refreshing Aloe Vera Gel
sunscreen.description: Refreshing after sun gel for face and body hydrates skin for 24 hours* and promotes a long-lasting, intense tan. Formulated with Organic Aloe Vera extract, this moisture treatment soothes and takes the sting out of sun exposure.
sunscreen.benefits: Hydrates skin for 48 hours* Promotes a long-lasting, intense tan that resists peeling and flaking. Leaves skin soft, smooth and comfortable. Non-sticky balm texture melts into the skin without leaving white residue. Tropical, woody-floral scent with a twist of citrus. Sleek take-along tube, great for travel!
sunscreen.usage: Smooth onto face and body skin immediately after sun exposure.

sunscreen.product name: SOS Sunburn Soother Mask - After Sun Cooling Gel Mask
sunscreen.description: Comforting after sun mask for face and body hydrates skin for 48 hours* and soothes red, hot, sunburned skin.
sunscreen.benefits: Hydrates skin for 48 hours* Soothes and cools down red, hot, sunburned skin. Leaves skin soft, smooth and comfortable. Cool, melting texture. Helps protect skin from the effects of free radicals. Easy to take-along jar is great for travel. Tropical woody-floral scent with a twist of citrus* Corneometry test - 30 volunteers.
sunscreen.usage: Apply to sunburned skin on face and body immediately after sun exposure. Reapply throughout the day.

sunscreen.product name: Radiance-Plus Golden Glow Booster for Face
sunscreen.description: Self tanning drops for face designed to be mixed with any moisturizer to create a radiant, even, made-to-measure tan.
sunscreen.benefits: Creates a natural-looking, made-to-measure tan. Long-lasting, streak-free results. Easy, mistake-proof application. Leaves skin soft, supple, and hydrated. Won’t stain or smudge.
sunscreen.usage: Apply 3-4 times a week to create and maintain a sun-kissed natural glow, or use it to enhance or even out an existing tan.

sunscreen.product name: Radiance-Plus Golden Glow Booster for Body
sunscreen.description: Self tanning drops for face designed to be mixed with any moisturizer to create a radiant, even, made-to-measure tan.
sunscreen.benefits: Creates a natural-looking, made-to-measure tan. Long-lasting, streak-free results. Easy, mistake-proof application. Leaves skin soft, supple, and hydrated. Won’t stain or smudge.
sunscreen.usage: Apply 3-4 times a week to create and maintain a sun-kissed natural glow, or use it to enhance or even out an existing tan.

sunscreen.product name: After Sun Shower Gel - Cleanser for Removing Sunscreen
sunscreen.description: Refreshing after sun shower gel for face, body and hair removes every last trace of UV filters, salt, sand, chlorine odors, and pollution.
sunscreen.benefits: 3-in-1 formula gently cleanses face, body, and hair. Eliminates UV filters, salt, sand, chlorine odors, and pollution. Leaves skin and hair soft and silky. Sleek, take-along tube is made from recycled plastic. Tropical woody-floral scent with a twist of citrus.
sunscreen.usage: Apply to damp skin and hair, work into a lather, and rinse. Gentle enough for daily use.

sunscreen.product name: Self Tanning Milky Lotion - Face + Body Self Tanner
sunscreen.description: Lightweight self tanning lotion for face and body delivers a natural-looking sun-kissed glow and 24-hour hydration.
sunscreen.benefits: Creates a tailor-made tan—from sun-touched to deep bronze. Hydrates for 24 hours. Long-lasting, streak-free, natural-looking. Won’t smudge or stain clothes.
sunscreen.usage: Apply 3-4 times a week to create and maintain a sun-kissed, natural glow—or use it to enhance or even out an existing tan on face and body.

sunscreen.product name: Self Tanning Instant Gel - Quick + Instant Self Tanner Gel for Face + Body
sunscreen.description: Quick-drying self tanning gel for face and body that delivers a buildable, natural-looking glow for an instant self tan.
sunscreen.benefits: Creates a tailor-made, buildable, instant self tan—from sun-touched to deep bronze. Long-lasting, streak-free, natural-looking. Won’t smudge or stain clothes.
sunscreen.usage: Apply 3-4 times a week to create and maintain a sun-kissed, natural glow—or use it to enhance or even out an existing tan on face and body.

sunscreen.description: Bundle and save on easy-to-apply self-tanning for the whole body.
sunscreen.benefits: Creates a tailor-made, buildable, instant self tan—from sun-touched to deep bronze. Long-lasting, streak-free, natural-looking. Won’t smudge or stain clothes.
